original_text: He is to put on the sacred linen tunic, with linen undergarments next to his body; he is to tie the linen sash around him and put on the linen turban. These are sacred garments; so he must bathe himself with water before he puts them on.
korean_text: 거룩한 세마포 속옷을 입으며 세마포 속바지를 몸에 입고 세마포 띠를 띠며 세마포 관을 쓸지니 이것들은 거룩한 옷이라 물로 그의 몸을 씻고 입을 것이며

sentences.original_text: He is to put on the sacred linen tunic
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거룩한 세포 속옷을 입어야 한다

sentences.original_text: with linen undergarments next to his body
sentences.korean_translation: 몸에 가까운 곳에 아마 속옷을 착용하고

sentences.original_text: he is to tie the linen sash around him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 허리에 아마 띠를 매어야 한다

sentences.original_text: and put on the linen turban
so he must bathe himself with water
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 물로 몸을 씻어야 한다
